TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit JpegBitmapEncoder extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder
Public NotInheritable Class JpegBitmapEncoder Inherits BitmapEncoder

summary.span: Defines an encoder that is used to encode Joint Photographics Experts Group (JPEG) format images.

span.span: Defines an encoder that is used to encode Joint Photographics Experts Group (JPEG) format images.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] 格式的位图支持帧级缩略图和帧级元数据。 format bitmaps support frame level thumbnails and frame level metadata. 它们不支持预览、 全局缩略图、 全局元数据或多个帧。They do not support preview, global thumbnails, global metadata, or multiple frames. 不能在部分信任环境中进行编码。Encoding does not work in partial trust. 请参阅[WPF 部分信任安全](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md)有关部分信任的信息。See [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md) for information on partial trust.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image should be flipped horizontally during encoding.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image should be flipped horizontally during encoding.

value.span: 如果要在编码; 期间水平翻转图像否则为。

span.span: if the image is flipped horizontally during encoding; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 文本使用情况XAML Text Usage 水平翻转源映像的无损转换，并会替换任何以前的无损转换。The horizontal flip represents a lossless transformation of the source image and replaces any previous lossless transformation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置的值属性。The following example demonstrates how to set the value of the property. summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image should be flipped vertically during encoding.

value.span: 如果要在编码; 期间垂直翻转图像否则为。

span.span: if the image is flipped vertically during encoding; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 垂直翻转的源映像的无损转换，并替换以前的无损转换。The vertical flip represents a lossless transformation of the source image and replaces any previous lossless transformation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置的值属性。The following example demonstrates how to set the value of the property. summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the quality level of the resulting [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the quality level of the resulting [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image.
The quality level of the JPEG image.

value.span: 值范围是 1 （最低质量） 到 100 （最高质量） 的非独占。

span.span: The value range is 1 (lowest quality) to 100 (highest quality) inclusive.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that represents the degree to which a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image is rotated.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that represents the degree to which a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)] image is rotated.

value.span: 指定要将图像旋转的程度。

span.span: The degree to which the image is rotated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 旋转仅支持 90 度的增量。Rotation is supported only in 90-degree increments. 旋转的源映像的无损转换，并替换任何以前的无损转换。The rotation represents a lossless transformation of the source image and replaces any previous lossless transformation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置的值属性。The following example demonstrates how to set the value of the property. [!code-cpp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/jpegencoderdecoder.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/JpegEncoderDecoder.cs#2)] [!code-vb[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/JpegEncoderDecoder.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/jpegencoderdecoder.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/JpegEncoderDecoder.cs#3)] [!code-vb[jpegbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JpegBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/JpegEncoderDecoder.vb#3)]
